articles.title: Kushal Tandon BREAKS SILENCE on engagement rumours with Shivangi Joshi - Bollywood Life
articles.description: Kushal Tandon and Shivangi Joshi are currently ruling the headlines as rumours have it that they are going to get engaged. But now the actors have reacted to the reports.
